meanings.definition: A person who tends and cultivates a garden.
meanings.sent1: The gardener planted colorful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor hired a gardener to maintain their backyard.
meanings.sent3: The gardener accidentally watered the plants with lemonade instead of water!
meanings.sent4: She was a gardener of dreams, nurturing them with care and patience.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's hands were always covered in soil, a true sign of hard work.

meanings.definition: One who is employed to take care of a garden or lawn.
meanings.sent1: Our school hired a gardener to mow the grass every week.
meanings.sent2: The gardener trimmed the bushes neatly along the pathway.
meanings.sent3: The gardener decided to give the garden a haircut, much to the plants' surprise!
meanings.sent4: She was a gardener of nature, sculpting the landscape with precision.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's dedication shone through in the beautifully maintained garden.
